addressOfEscrowDst((bytes32,bytes32,uint.details: Uses Clones.predictDeterministicAddress to match the deployment method

addressOfEscrowSrc((bytes32,bytes32,uint.details: Uses Clones.predictDeterministicAddress to match the deployment method

params.bmnToken: BMN token for staking and access

returns._0: address[] Array of active resolver addresses

params.orderMaker: The address that created the order

returns._0: bool True if the interaction has been processed
bool True if resolver is valid

postInteraction((uint256,uint256,uint256.details: This function is called by the limit order protocol after order filling.

takerInteraction((uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Verifies the proof and stores the last validated index and hashed secret. Only Limit Order Protocol can call this function.

addResolver(address).notice: Add a new resolver to the whitelist

addResolverToWhitelist(address).notice: Add a resolver to whitelist (renamed to avoid conflict)

createDstEscrow((bytes32,bytes32,uint256.notice: Override createDstEscrow to add pause check and resolver validation

getActiveResolvers().notice: Get list of all active resolvers
